## Atom.getIdentityDerivation() method

Returns a new derivation of the value at the provided path.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getIdentityDerivation(path: Array<string | number>): IDerivation<unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | Array&lt;string \| number&gt; | The path to create the derivation at. |
